title: Experiential Mathematics Learning Design Based on Reflective Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic mathematical concepts (secondary education level)
context.additional_context: Non-degree course for enhancing job-linked mathematical problem-solving skills among job seekers, combining LMS-based online discussions with real-life case analysis in a hybrid learning environment

learning_goals: Learners can convert real-world problems into mathematical models and solve them with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can explain their learning process through reflective journaling after experiential activities, with in-depth analysis at three or more levels.
Learners can modify and improve their mathematical problem-solving strategies three or more times based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
